lead_paragraph: The George Washington junior Maureece Rice made himself available for the N.B.A. draft, but he plans to retain his N.C.A.A. eligibility. Rice led the Colonials in scoring, averaging 15.8 points.
snippet: The George Washington junior Maureece Rice made himself available for the N.B.A. draft, but he plans to retain his N.C.A.A. eligibility. Rice led the Colonials in scoring, averaging 15.8 points.
